ssa-disability-insurance-child.title: Social Security Disability Insurance for Child
ssa-disability-insurance-child.headline: Social Security Disability Insurance for Child
ssa-disability-insurance-child.summary: Social Security Disability Insurance provides financial assistance to minor children whose parents receive disability benefits.
ssa-disability-insurance-child.criticalA: Only one application is needed to apply for all the benefits offered by SSA.
ssa-disability-insurance-child.eligibili: You are under 18 years old (under 19 years old if you are a full-time student in an elementary or secondary school).
